text: They didn't update their pricing in store, and charged me the full amount when I expected the promo price. They admitted that they forgot to take down the promo price, but since I didn't take the receipt unfortunately, they refused to refund when we returned to store and pointed at their display. Emailed to HQ and also no answer. Poor form.
Thank you Sally Yap for your excellent service!
The shop was void of shoppers but the cashier was accommodating n friendly
Had the product that I was looking for, that was sold out at Watson's but the cashier was rude.
I came here but there was no pharmacist on duty! How should I know? Posted a photo for others.
